item.title: terraform - dynamically created vSphere anti-affinity rules
item.description: As we’ve continued to mature our Terraform modules, we have been working to give our operations team more flexbility in how they are consumed. We wanted to make sure if more than one server was being deployed from a single configuration, that vSphere DRS anti-affinity rules would be created for them. I think we’ve all forgotten to create an anti-affinity rule or two. So now, our Terraform does this for us.
